meta.name: description
meta.content: We transform schools so that every child has the knowledge and character to pursue the path to college and opportunities beyond.

meta.name: keywords
meta.script: {"@context":"https://schema.org","@graph":[{"@type":"Organization","@id":"https://dcscholars.org/#organization","url":"https://dcscholars.org/","name":"DC Scholars Public Charter School","sameAs":[]},{"@type":"WebSite","@id":"https://dcscholars.org/#website","url":"https://dcscholars.org/","name":"DC Scholars Public Charter School","publisher":{"@id":"https://dcscholars.org/#organization"}},{"@type":"WebPage","@id":"https://dcscholars.org/#webpage","url":"https://dcscholars.org/","inLanguage":"en-GB","name":"Home","isPartOf":{"@id":"https://dcscholars.org/#website"},"image":{"@type":"ImageObject","@id":"https://dcscholars.org/#primaryimage","url":"https://dcscholars.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/26.jpg","width":1920,"height":800},"primaryImageOfPage":{"@id":"https://dcscholars.org/#primaryimage"},"datePublished":"2018-08-24T11:04:45+00:00","dateModified":"2020-02-13T15:38:54+00:00","about":{"@id":"https://dcscholars.org/#organization"},"description":"DC Scholars Public Charter School serves students grades PreK3-8th grade. We exist to provide a high quality public education preparing students to be college and career ready. "}]}

div.class: bg-primary mt-2 mb-4 text-center slogan text-white position-relative

div.p: Enrollment season is upon us! Secure your seat for the 2020-2021 school year!
Find the March Lunch Menus here!
DC Scholars were visited by OSSE on Monday February 3rd to celebrate DC Scholars being named a All-Star School for yielding outstanding results for students based on the DC STAR report!
The weather outside is frightful but long sleeve uniform shirts are so delightful! Purchase DC Scholars uniform gear here!

div.div:
5601 E. Capitol St. SE
Washington, DC 20019

div.h1: DC Scholars PCS students will participate in distance learning from March 24 to May 15th. Please reference the Family Distance Learning How-To-Guide for resources during this time!
Need to complete enrollment to secure your seat for SY20-21?
